root.name: Super Quick Hook
root.description: Super QuickHook is a Grappling Hook Game for the iPhone operating system and sequel to the hit iPhone game Hook Champ. Players can choose from five characters (Jakob, Tara, Hermit, Aldora and Gnomey), 20 hooks and over three dozen hats.GameplaySuper Quick Hook revolves around beating levels for the fastest time. You hold down on the screen to throw a hook and release your touch to let go of the hook creating momentum. Upon the completion of a level you are given a score based on your time, secrets found, and coins collected. The score you receive rewards you money to spend in the store to purchase upgrades, hats, characters, and different hooks. There are 27 levels, (not counting the Credits level) two of which are endless modes called Avalanche and Eruption where you try to stay alive while moving as fast as you can avoiding the snow or lava that is right behind you.CharactersThere are 4 playable characters: Jakob, Tara, Hermit, and Aldora. Hermit and Aldora must be unlocked by performing certain tasks such as beating a local developer score and dying once in the Eruption level.Hermit hatless using a rocket jump
